channel.title: PI need help to restrict rare spawning

item.title: PI need help to restrict rare spawning
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[code=java] if(c.playerRights >= 0) {

  if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {   
        try {
           String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
           if (args.length == 3) {
              int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
              int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
            if(newItemID >= 1030 && newItemID <= 1045 || newItemID == 995) {
              c.sendMessage("You can't spawn that item!");
              return;
            }
              if ((newItemID <= 12861) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
                 c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);      
              } else {
                 c.sendMessage("No such item.");
              }
           } else {
              c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp");
           }
        } catch(Exception e) {
           
        }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: PI need help to restrict rare spawning

item.title: PI need help to restrict rare spawning
item.dc:creator: @bodya7 bodya7
item.description:
@bodya7 wrote:

Can someone plase help me restrict spawning something like 1038 (Red Phat) for example?

if(c.playerRights >= 0) { 
	if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {	
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 12861) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}</blockquote>
